column4: can anyone help me with WPA wifi networking in 6.10? i'm trying to follow https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WPAHowTo, but the network-manager-gnome package doesn't seem to exist
sounds like your sources.list needs help. network-manager-gnome is in Main.
i just realised that moments after i typed my question. Have now enabled universe and am installing it
